Let's write a Python script to efficiently search through the text and find the person associated with applauding the color brown.

```python
text = """
Isira sneers at artificial intelligence. Lachlann detests science. Harikrishna commends gardening. Phoenix approves of biology. Keenan-Lee pines for listening to rock music. Bracken execrates comic books. Selasi basks in playing sudoku. Kallin disapproves of playing flute. Fynn adores the color black. Stewart resents stock market trends. Muhsin exalts playing video games. Calean ridicules cleaning the bathroom. Eoghain glories in the color amber. Nathaniel endorses quiche. Jadon eschews the color ruby. Tokinaga disdains listening to rock music. Oluwalayomi ridicules metaphysics. Cinar finds fulfillment in the color plum. Jackson fancies hip-hop dancing. Zerah yearns for solving riddles. Fares welcomes dusting the shelves. Saunders extols sailing. TJ is crazy about salsa. Christian treasures innovation. Mason-Jay shuns the color orange. Zidane is passionate about sports cars. Ruairidh laments playing video games. Samy disapproves of modern architecture. Ciar likes beauty. Rhy ridicules sweeping the driveway. Tee blasts writing poetry. Roy reviles reading science fiction. Jon-Paul finds satisfaction in the color fuchsia. Brogan glories in astronomy. Laurence reveres fruit salad. Ruadhan thrives on limousines. Damian disdains the color olive. Abdurraheem adores compassion. Kurtis-Jae values cryptocurrency. Abubakar celebrates preparing breakfast. Ty dislikes playing billiards. Maryk idolizes bears. Philippos values steak. Selasi is partial to stir-fry. Fynlay can’t bear sustainable living. Davy approves of playing video games.
"""

# Find the person who applauds the color brown
import re

match = re.search(r'(\w+) applauds the color brown', text)
name = match.group(1) if match else None

print(name)
```

Executing the above code will help us identify the person who applauds the color brown.
